query:
SELECT 
  pw.id, pw.waveNumber, pw.status as wave_status, pw.pickedBy, pw.pickedAt,
  COUNT(pwi.id) as total_items,
  SUM(CASE WHEN pwi.status = 'picked' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as picked_items
FROM pickingWaves pw
LEFT JOIN pickingWaveItems pwi ON pwi.waveId = pw.id
WHERE pw.waveNumber = 'OS-20260121-0001'
GROUP BY pw.id;

  COUNT(pwi.id) as total_items,
  SUM(CASE WHEN pwi.status = 'picked' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as picked_items
FROM pickingWaves pw
LEFT JOIN pickingWaveItems pwi ON pwi.waveId = pw.id
